figure_1.title: Fig. 1.
figure_1.caption: Genome-wide HetLOD scores for 11 high-risk primary brain cancer pedigrees combined.

figure_2.title: Fig. 2.
figure_2.caption: High-risk primary brain cancer pedigree K5101 showing evidence for linkage on chromosome 16; only descendants connected to genotyped primary brain cancer cases (fully shaded) are shown. *Inferred haplotype carriers.

claims.sentence: Summary genome-wide het-TLODs for both the dominant and recessive models are shown in Figure 1.
